Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive: Reduces Summoner Spell cooldowns by 10%


''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive: +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive: Reduces Summoner Spell cooldowns by 10% ''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Boots.description: <unique>UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement:</unique> +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.
Boots.name: Boots of Mobility
Boots.plaintext: Greatly enhances Movement Speed when out of combat
Boots.sanitizedDescription: UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +25 Movement Speed. Increases to +105 Movement Speed when out of combat for 5 seconds.

Boots.description:
+25 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed
UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.
Boots.name: Mercury's Treads
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and reduces duration of disabling effects
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed UNIQUE Passive - Tenacity: Reduces the duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, polymorphs, and immobilizes by 20%.

Endgame Items.description:
+75 Attack Damage
+100% Base Health Regen
+12% Life Steal

Passive: Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item.
UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage).
UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Ravenous Hydra
Endgame Items.plaintext: Melee attacks hit nearby enemies, dealing damage and restoring Health
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +75 Attack Damage +100% Base Health Regen +12% Life Steal Passive: Life Steal applies to damage dealt by this item. UNIQUE Passive - Cleave: Basic attacks deal 20% to 60% of total Attack Damage as bonus physical damage to enemies near the target on hit (enemies closest to the target take the most damage). UNIQUE Active - Crescent: Deals 60% to 100% of total Attack Damage as physical damage to nearby enemy units (closest enemies take the most damage) (10 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+300 Health
+55 Attack Damage
+20% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%).
UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.
Endgame Items.name: The Black Cleaver
Endgame Items.plaintext: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions reduces their Armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +300 Health +55 Attack Damage +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage to an enemy champion Cleaves them, reducing their Armor by 5% for 6 seconds (stacks up to 6 times, up to 30%). UNIQUE Passive - Rage: Dealing physical damage grants 20 movement speed for 2 seconds. Assists on Cleaved enemy champions or kills on any unit grant 60 movement speed for 2 seconds instead. This Movement Speed is halved for ranged champions.

Endgame Items.description:
+65 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration
UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).
Endgame Items.name: Youmuu's Ghostblade
Endgame Items.plaintext: Activate to greatly increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +65 Attack Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: +20 Armor Penetration UNIQUE Active: Grants +20% Movement Speed and +40% Attack Speed for 6 seconds (45 second cooldown).

Endgame Items.description:
+65 Attack Damage
+10% Cooldown Reduction

UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage heals for 12% of the damage dealt. This is 33% as effective for Area of Effect damage.
UNIQUE Passive: 12% of damage taken is dealt as a Bleed effect over 3 seconds instead.
Endgame Items.name: Death's Dance
Endgame Items.plaintext: Trades incoming damage now for incoming damage later
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +65 Attack Damage +10% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Dealing physical damage heals for 12% of the damage dealt. This is 33% as effective for Area of Effect damage. UNIQUE Passive: 12% of damage taken is dealt as a Bleed effect over 3 seconds instead.

Endgame Items.description:
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Giant Slayer: Grants up to +15% physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum Health than you (+1.5% damage per 50 Health difference, maxing at 500 Health difference).
UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +40% Bonus Armor Penetration.
Endgame Items.name: Lord Dominik's Regards
Endgame Items.plaintext: Overcomes enemies with high health and armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive - Giant Slayer: Grants up to +15% physical damage against enemy champions with greater maximum Health than you (+1.5% damage per 50 Health difference, maxing at 500 Health difference). UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +40% Bonus Armor Penetration.

Endgame Items.description:
+55 Attack Damage
+50 Magic Resist
+10 Armor Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs magic damage equal to 300 + 1 per bonus Magic Resistance for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown).
UNIQUE Passive - Lifegrip: When Lifeline triggers, gain +25% Attack Speed, +10% Spell Vamp, and +10% Life Steal until out of combat.
Endgame Items.name: Maw of Malmortius
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants bonus Attack Damage when Health is low
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +55 Attack Damage +50 Magic Resist +10 Armor Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Lifeline: Upon taking magic damage that would reduce Health below 30%, grants a shield that absorbs magic damage equal to 300 + 1 per bonus Magic Resistance for 5 seconds (90 second cooldown). UNIQUE Passive - Lifegrip: When Lifeline triggers, gain +25% Attack Speed, +10% Spell Vamp, and +10% Life Steal until out of combat.

Endgame Items.description:
+40 Attack Damage

UNIQUE Passive - Executioner: Physical damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemy champions for 5 seconds.
UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +40% Bonus Armor Penetration.
Endgame Items.name: Mortal Reminder
Endgame Items.plaintext: Overcomes enemies with high Health recovery and Armor
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40 Attack Damage UNIQUE Passive - Executioner: Physical damage inflicts Grievous Wounds on enemy champions for 5 seconds. UNIQUE Passive - Last Whisper: +40% Bonus Armor Penetration.

Jungle Items.description:
Limited to 1 Jungle item

+10% Life Steal vs. Monsters
+150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle

UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience.
UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop.

(A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Jungle Items.name: Tracker's Knife
Jungle Items.plaintext: Makes your Smite give extra gold from the enemy jungle
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Jungle item +10% Life Steal vs. Monsters +150% Base Mana Regen while in Jungle UNIQUE Passive - Tooth / Nail: Basic attacks deal 20 bonus damage vs. monsters. Damaging a monster steals 30 Health over 5 seconds. Killing a Large Monster grants +30 bonus experience. UNIQUE Active - Warding: Consumes a charge to place a Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 150 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges which refill upon visiting the shop. (A player may only have 3 Stealth Wards on the map at one time. Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds.

Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges.

Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level.

(Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Consume a charge to place an invisible Stealth Ward which reveals the surrounding area for 60 - 120 seconds. Stores one charge every 180 - 120 seconds, up to 2 maximum charges. Ward duration and recharge time gradually improve with level. (Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. Switching to a Lens type trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.

Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge.

(Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)
Starting Items.name: Hunter's Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health and Mana over time - Refills at shop and has increased capacity
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 60 Health and 35 Mana over 8 seconds. Holds up to 5 charges and refills upon visiting the shop. Killing a Large Monster grants 1 charge. (Killing a Large Monster at full charges will automatically consume the newest charge.)

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion.

UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
Starting Items.name: Refillable Potion
Starting Items.plaintext: Restores Health over time. Refills at shop.
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 type of Healing Potion. UNIQUE Active: Consumes a charge to restore 125 Health over 12 seconds. Holds up to 2 charges and refills upon visiting the shop.
